attributes.action: get banks or bank hub back into north end portsmouth hampshire
attributes.additional_details: so we can bank and not so far away to travel to a bank
attributes.background: to help get banks or a bank hub back in to north end portsmouth

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the location of bank branches are a matter for individual banks, not the UK Government or Parliament.
